title: Logistics System - MRO
description: I was one of the front-end developers responsible for an important logistics project for the MRO company in partnership with Teamsoft. Using React, I created a scalable and efficient solution, ensuring an excellent user experience. I am happy with the result and proud to have contributed to the project's success.

title: Blog - Hacking Force
description: This project is a logistics system for the MRO company developed by Teamsoft, and I was one of the front-end developers responsible for its implementation using React. I worked on the project from its inception and created the user interface to provide an efficient and scalable solution. I am proud of my contribution to the project and the role I played in its success.

title: Challenge - Teamsoft
description: As part of the Teamsoft selection process, I was responsible for developing a challenging checkout page using the React library. In addition to creating an attractive and intuitive user interface, I implemented the necessary functionalities to consume an API within the given timeframe. I am very satisfied with the final result.
